pr_title: [BEAM-4150] Remove fallback case for coder not specified within RemoteGrpcPort.

timeline.message:
[BEAM-4150] Update all runners/SDKs to only use the coder id on the RemoteGrpcPort.

Update the JRH in Dataflow to specify the coder id on the RemoteGrpcPort.
All runners now specify the coder id so we can remove the fallback case.

[BEAM-4150] Update all runners/SDKs to only use the coder id on the RemoteGrpcPort.

Update the JRH in Dataflow to specify the coder id on the RemoteGrpcPort.
All runners now specify the coder id so we can remove the fallback case.

timeline.bodyText: Please run gofmt on your code. Go uses Tabs for indentation, not spaces.
